enhanced_by.reason: Checking system status ensures the platform is operational before attempting a withdrawal.
Ensures the account is in good standing and not restricted before processing a withdrawal.
Verifies that the API key has the necessary trading permissions for withdrawals.
Validates that the withdrawal was successfully recorded in the history.
Compares the account snapshot before and after the withdrawal to verify the balance change.
Checks for any deposits that might have occurred due to internal transfers or fees.
